title: App redesign (#15)
message:
App redesign (#15)

* Clicking on drawer logo goes to home activity

* We can remove v21 styles since we used appcompat styles

* Fix video thumnail in newly added messages

* Add rounded courners to images

* Style qrcode & no title in news items

* Update all newsItems of a service when connect/disconnect

* Query for iOS to get pinned news

* Style news options

* Re-added double tap to reply

* Make sending read, rogers percistent

* Update news stats receive handler so it handles both rogered & read stats

* Refactored taking images and videos via built-in library.

* Added ack for rogered call to news channel

* fix some deprecation warnings

* Better icon for our own camera implementation

* Fix stats when server returned null

* Added notification to new news

* Fix click on action when no friends

* Update navigation sidebar

* add some margin to friend detail/invite

* Fix for  date and time pickers not triggering change events on android 5.0

* Change news channel so it doesn't keep retrying to connect when no valid configuration was found

* refactor(service search): nuke SEARCH_SERVICES_IF_NONE_CONNECTED

* temporarily disable widgets

* Added badge count to messages

* Fixed photo and video capture, added error logging.

* fix navigation constants

* update gradle version

* change checkboxes to appcompat checkboxes

* Added helper class to execute pokes

* remove duplicated ripple

* fix colour of range slider

* Make drawer variables private

* Clicking a message button should ack the messages sent before that message

* Add support for news channel over SSL. Stash commands when not connected to channel yet, and send them once connected.

* Increase range slider thickness

* Fix button colours on android < 5.0

* Fix clicking on services in menu

* Bump target sdk to 24

* Use chrome custom tabs instead of webview for opening external links in brandings

* Update shortcutbadger, adds support for huawei devices

* Request friend set after app update

* Don't use insecure TrustManagerFactory in production

* fix(news): Make the loading popup cancelable

* Do not excecute click on same activity

* Bumped version in manifest

* feat(branding): add ability to natively render branding instead of using a webview

* remove duplicated connect to news channel

* Added new custom cloud constants to prepare_build

* fix facebook provider

* update default icons

* add missing 2x3 homescreen

* remove ripple effect from homescreens

* fix(registration): Close app when pressing 'back' in 'sign up with email' step

* Removed unused method from prepare_build

* fix(news): fix 1 pixel whitespace that was shown next to a news item image

* fix icons not showing up due to changing application id (??)

* fix(news): initialize truststore factory

* fix(news): add 1 px margin to images

* Fix iconics font not working on non-rogerthat apps

* improve manifest

* improve notifications. Adds a quick-reply button to messages.

* Use custom tabs to open web urls on news buttons

* Fix navigation footer color

* Use custom translations as well when generating the navigation menu

* fix notification without long text showing empty text

* Fix new news items' images not being rounded properly

* Added new hint for broadcasts

* Update badge when updating message dirty

* get rid of product flavors to speed up jenkins build

* Allow click on search icons

* Fixed newschannel for use with ssl

* Revert "Fixed newschannel for use with ssl"

This reverts commit 22c1b697cfe120fb0953d009e3064a4eff24bb32.

* Revert "Revert "Fixed newschannel for use with ssl""

This reverts commit b20a46dbc808c222ce3ae50265a6364f4cf06656.

* Fixed news channel for use with ssl

* improve notification ids

* Style message unread count badge

* Exported translations

* Unpin items in news list when unpinned from pinned list

* Added primary color dark

* Fix clicking on empty space

* Do not show notification for silent messages

* Fix notification when no unread messages

* Allow native branding renderer to not display an avatar when it's not found in the branding

* Fix quick reply on messages with only 14 message

* Do not show 1st message of chats & do not show reply chat read only

* Do not show circle until icon is ready

* Translations

* Hide webviews when using native branding renderer

* Fixed encoding issue in custom translations

* Bumped version in AndroidManifest to 1.0.2465.A

* Add badge on news items

* Generate to's

* Update chat title

* Show hamburger when collapse in service list

* Improve news usage statistics

* Style member status in friends thread

* rename transfer object

* Generate to's

* typo

* Generate to's

* upgrade gradle plugin to 2.2.2

* Show message and sender name in native branding

* Make sure you are connected to the internet when connecting to a service

* Improve sort order friend actions

* Keep title when going to next step

* Don't show updates available for hidden news items

* Pinned items are always displayed even if hidden

* Change background color settings

* Fix button style after using appcompat buttons

* Generate to's

* Fix compilation error

* Change color of input text according to colorscheme

* Fix merge confict

* Customizable background image in chats

* fix merge conflict

* Fix color of single, multi selects in color scheme dark

* Fix color of single, range sliders in color scheme dark

* Fix color of date, datetime pickers in color scheme dark

* Improved chat layout

* Update translations

* Improve button layout

* Add maxlines to new message

* fix(service homescreen): Allow setting a different colour on each menu item.

Also fixes the main branding's layout being incorrect after receiving an update from the server to update it.

* Smart update news for read, roger

* Improve colors of textline, textblock, autocomplete

* Remove debugging code

* Registration fix activate button

* Always use appcompat buttons

* Update menu icons for rogerthat

* fix(add friends/service recommend): Fix icons in add friends activity appearing white

* fix title in service detail messages not being set

* Increase navigation drawer item text size

* remove 'read less'

* fix prepare build for osa-loyalty

* fix asset downloading when first installing the app

* queue branding if it is not available

* Add horizontal scale property to app assets

* patch message recipients sometimes being empty

* Bumped version in AndroidManifest to 1.0.2473.A

* WIP refactor news to scale better

* Fix send message should show drawer

* WIP news items in batch

* Do not show more items when loading initial items

* Fix going to top of list

* Finish pinned news with scale design

* Refactor newschannel into newsplugin

* Fix loading reach from channel

* Removed unused items

* Removed unused class

* Added NEWS_ENABLED to AppConstants.java

* fix welcome text translation

* fix(widget/textblock): don't set minimum amount of lines to 3

* Fix contraint exceptions in update partial item

* Update support library to 25.0.0

* Don't show build-in zoom controls on mapview

* Fix thread errors when removing a conversation

* update fontawesome to to 4.7.0

* Fix height of hidden items

* Change button text to icon in "add action button" dialog

* Fix pull down of news list with the 1st item invisible

* Only show name from last friend who sent message in message overview for group chats.

Also fix group chat subtitle not showing up when opening a group chat.

* Improve speed of rendering webview service action menu's

* Add all recipients in the parent message

* Change registration translation

* More space for fields in profile & simplify markup

* Don't use end in gravity

* Don't change the version in debug

* Fix new avatar preview being too small

* perf improvement

* fix(news): avoid executing click action multiple times

* Fix news update reach

* fix(news): Change text when pressing action button for not-connected services

* fix(news): show empty placeholder for news item images that aren't downloaded yet

* refresh image for rounded corners after a message was 'rogered'

* fix(news): fix pulldown to refresh sometimes showing partial item

* avoid flickering when showing/hiding reach loading spinner

* Remove unused logic

* Only update reach when bigger & fix flashing of reach

* Fix reach not fully showed on screen

* Pull down will always refresh the list

* Send news and new message notifications with sound

* Fix intent data of multiple intents

* Always show a title in service message detail

* Rename button to continue in location usage screen

* [NEWS] Rename hide to unsubscribe

* Fix unpin pinned news

* News item click area

* Always open action directly

* Use hashes instead of clear text for tags and actions

* Fix release script with new build.yaml's

* Ceil default date_select value instead of flooring

* Always clear dirty flags when closing service message

* Fixed error in prepare_build for empty actions

* Fix enabled/disabled color for buttons

* Making sure the message is always stored into the db when starting new activity

* Store all recipients in recipients field instead of only the last

* Fix nullpointer when sender was dashboard

* Add background to new message activity

* Fix subtitle in chat

* show last sender in message list for group chats

* Update translations

* Update translations

* Fix loyalty registration

* Use darker primary colour for colorPrimaryDark and secondary color for colorAccent

* Update licences

* Update screenshot tests

* Added first version of encryption specs

* Updated security specs

* WIP Secured app

* Added licence header

* New widget: friend_select
